thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rebecca Corbin, Founder / Managing Partner of Corbin Perception Group, LLC, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year
thread.title_full: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rebecca Corbin, Founder / Managing Partner of Corbin Perception Group, LLC, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year

author: Lisa Mancuso
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rebecca Corbin, Founder / Managing Partner of Corbin Perception Group, LLC, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year
text:
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Rebecca Corbin as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters. “I’m pleased to welcome Rebecca into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
In 2007, Ms. Corbin founded Corbin Perception Group, LLC, a leading investor research and investor relations (IR) advisory firm assisting public companies with long-term shareholder value creation.
Ms. Corbin’s ability to provide strategic counsel to a multitude of clients has made her a front-runner in her industry. Her strengths include institutional investor research and insight, strategy and thought leadership content development, crisis communications, investor marketing and IR best practices.
Among her accolades, Ms. Corbin is a recurring guest speaker on CNBC, serves on the Board of Visitors and Governors at Washington College, her alma mater where she earned a Bachelor of Arts in Business Management, and is a trustee in the Connecticut Women’s Hall of Fame. She is also involved with the National Investor Relations Institute (NIRI), where she is Co-President of the Virtual Chapter Board of Directors 2015 - 2016.
Ms. Corbin’s interest in investor research and IR has brought much success to her company, her employees and her clients. “It is an exciting time for Corbin Perception as we continue to grow our brand by providing thoughtful, relevant and actionable insights that help our clients differentiate their investment theses and drive long-term value for their shareholders,” said Ms. Corbin, who has been able to continually and effectively accomplish exactly that.
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
